FuncDef:
The ntp server source-interface all enable command enables the NTP/NTP IPv6 server to listen to all interfaces.
The ntp server source-interface all disable command disables the NTP/NTP IPv6 server from listening to all interfaces. The ntp server source-interface all enable command enables the NTP/NTP IPv6 server to listen to all interfaces. The ntp server source-interface all disable command disables the NTP/NTP IPv6 server from listening to all interfaces. By default, the NTP server does not listen to any interface.
Examples: [~HUAWEI] ntp ipv6 server source-interface all disable
Warning: NTP IPv4 server listening all interface will be enabled. Continue? [Y/N]:y
Warning: NTP IPv6 server listening all interface will be enabled. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: By default, the NTP server does not listen to any interface. You can run this command to enable the NTP server to listen to all interfaces.
